idiom.meaning: Strike directly at the heart of enemy territory
idiom.example: The military campaign bypassed smaller targets to strike directly at the enemy's capital

shortDescription: General Yue Fei's determination to recapture northern territories gave birth to this bold strategy of striking directly (直捣) at the Yellow Dragon (黄龙) - the Jin Dynasty's imperial palace in Kaifeng. The geographic symbolism carried both literal and metaphoric weight, representing...
